bioconda.name: revtrans
bioconda.summary: revtrans - performs a reverse translation of a peptide alignment.

biocontainers.name: revtrans
biocontainers.summary: Revtrans takes a set of dna sequences, virtually translates them, aligns the peptide sequences, and uses this as a scaffold for constructing the corresponding dna multiple alignment.

biotools.summary: RevTrans takes a set of DNA sequences, virtually translates them, aligns the peptide sequences, and uses this as a scaffold for constructing the corresponding DNA multiple alignment.

bioschemas.name: RevTrans
bioschemas.summary: RevTrans takes a set of DNA sequences, virtually translates them, aligns the peptide sequences, and uses this as a scaffold for constructing the corresponding DNA multiple alignment.
